pullrequest.title: Fix build dependency in message generation (#247)

content.raw:
Works for me.

I was also concerned about cross-`.proto` file dependencies, but it looks like `protoc` keeps the generated code files independent (at least in C++ and Python).  So it should be sufficient to regenerate the `.h` and `.cc` files when the corresponding `.proto` file changes, as is done with this patch.
content.html:
Works for me.

I was also concerned about cross-.proto file dependencies, but it looks like protoc keeps the generated code files independent (at least in C++ and Python). So it should be sufficient to regenerate the .h and .cc files when the corresponding .proto file changes, as is done with this patch.
